attributes.action: Stop the states of Guernsey breaking up families by evicting them from home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The States of Guernsey are in the process of evicting people from their rented homes many of these people are nearing retirement and cannot afford the rent of £750 per month in the private sector and cannot buy property which starts around £200k. this is breaking up families and is an infringement of human rights.Please help stop the bullying tactics of the Guernsey government.
